body:
I had a 10/10 creature which had first strike, lifelink and trample through equipment which was attacking and Ajani's Pridemate which was not. The attacking creature was blocked by a 5/3 creature.

Expected to gain one +1/+1 for Ajani but it got two instead. O_o What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.27 on WinXP SP3

If you look through the log, you will see, that I used undo at some times. One of them was something similar, but I didn't get any life or counter for Ajani, still I was attacking with a creature with lifelink. :/
author: [Jak1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112622755219524898050/)
title: Problem with Lifelink in combination with trample and first strike?

comments.body:
The issue persists with not just Lifelink, but any abilty that correlates damage dealt to lifegain with trample.

The ability should trigger once, not separately for damaging a creature and a player.

Done with Magarena 1.28 on Windows XP

**Attachment:** [game.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=268#hc1)
